Revised Edition, 2109
Access to housing corridors distributed based on contribution to Prism Maintenance and memory ethics
Temporary passage rights may be granted to new residents to ease transition, conditioned on acceptance of the city’s memory ethics
Public disclosures: quarterly report on housing accessibility, memory quotas, and prism capacity
Summary 2108-2110
Access to high-intensity prisms allocated by rate of community service and memory governance contributions
Apprenticeships in prism maintenance to include memory ethics training
Strike arbitration to preserve essential daylight during droughts, prioritizing hospitals, schools, and public safety
